entry.title: one single glimpse of relief
entry.summary:
Author: greyspilot

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,044Chapters: 9/20Kudos: 115

Summary: "What if I never get better? What if I always feel like this?" Buck finally looks back up at him, vulnerability and compassion clear on his too-expressive face. "I don't know," he says honestly. "I don't…" he shudders, gives a tiny shrug of his shoulders and tries again. "I don't have an answer for that, man. It's been seven months for me and I still feel…like this." "Like what?" Buck just shrugs again, then mumbles, "Not myself." And Eddie doesn't know what to say to that either, because this is the only version of Buck he's ever known.Or: Buck and Eddie meet at grief group.

entry.title: Evangaline Buckley Begins
entry.summary:
Author: Not_Ren_42

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,305Chapters: 15/24Kudos: 239

Summary: Evangaline Buckley has been alone for most of her life. She was unwanted by her parents and left by her sister when she had the first chance. For her most formative years, she had to go to extreme lengths just to get attention from those meant to care for her, failing more often than not.After finding out the truth about her creation, Evie decides that she has to do something – anything. She goes through even more pain and heartbreak before finding herself where she was always meant to end up. -+- This is both a prologue and season 1 rewrite.New chapter every Friday :)

entry.title: but if you're the one for me, then i'll be your hero
entry.summary:
Author: folklorestars

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,735Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 76

Summary: “Let me guess,” Eddie started, smiling faker than ever. “You thought I'd be dying to ride in a car with Evan Buckley as he sings to one of his big hits. A fan's dream come true!” Eddie grinned ear to ear as cheesy as possible. Buck smiled awkwardly, so Eddie continued, “There's just one problem.” “Which is?” “I'm not your fan.” There was that wounded puppy look again. The sad eyes bigger and bluer than ever, mouth drooping down almost into a pout. “You don't... You don't like my music?” “No, I like your music. And I think you’re talented. I'm just not crazy about you like everyone else seems to be,” Eddie clarified. Or; the Buddie Starstruck AU

entry.summary:
Author: maydecember

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,135Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

entry.summary:
Author: cowboydiaz317

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,053Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 48

Summary: Eddie can’t stop pacing. Christopher has been missing for 17 hours. He has no clue where he could possibly be. Half of his heart feels like it’s been ripped out and thrown somewhere he can’t find. Someone’s in his face saying, ‘oh come and find him, come and find him’. But he can’t. He can’t do.. anything. He’s helpless. OR: Speculation for 9x11 Buddie Canon cause I felt like it.

entry.title: Just one more breath
entry.summary:
Author: CarpeDiem911

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 84,678Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 343

Summary: The hysterical laughter stole every coherent thought from Buck and crawled into his bones; his heart thudded and he stared at the doll in disbelief. Then, as suddenly as it had started, the laughter stopped; leaving an eerie silence. Buck stood frozen, his thoughts like thick mud, staring at that stupid doll. He completely missed the huge hole in the wall above the tub. He missed the shadow standing there, watching him from behind the hole with cold eyes and a malicious smile.

entry.title: Lessons in Trust
entry.summary:
Author: sassay

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,035Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: The Buckley and Diaz families are the two most powerful elite criminal syndicates in LA. Both families have a long and sordid history in crime across the country but LA is where both family's main branches reside and to absolutely no one's surprise absolutely despise each other. There's the usual disagreements over territories but this feud is historical and none of the current members of the families actually know what the original trigger argument was about, but it's been carried down from generation to generation. Eddie Diaz and Evan 'Buck' Buckley are from opposing Mafia families - enemies by birthright but what happens when the game starts to change, loyalties waver and betrayals occur. Blood may be thicker than water - but not when it comes to power and you need to choose your family and allies carefully. A Mafia AU

entry.title: My advice is always ruin the friendship (Better that than regret it for all time)
entry.summary:
Author: Buddie_Girl

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,094Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 61

Summary: He looked down, shocked to see Christopher’s number displayed across his screen. They had texted occasionally, but it had been over six years since they last saw each other, and since Christopher never called him, something was clearly wrong. “Chris?” “Hey Buck, I know it's been a while, and I’m sorry to be so blunt, but Dad was hurt in a fire six weeks ago and has been in a coma ever since.” The color drains from Buck’s face. “I begged them to let him fight, but they won’t listen. Grandma and Abuelo, they want to…” He doesn’t let Christopher finish, “Christopher, is your dad dead?” He braces himself for the answer. It may have been over six years, but deep down, Buck’s feelings for his former partner have never changed. “No, because they aren’t in Dad’s power of attorney, you are.” Christopher tells him, “They tried to hide his will, but when they suggested pulling the plug, the hospital contacted the fire station that Dad works at, just to verify, and his captain turned it over. They couldn’t remove life support because they need you to sign off. I need you too…” Buck doesn’t even hear the last part as he’s sucked into his own thoughts.

entry.title: I screamed so loud (but no one heard a thing)
entry.summary:
Author: titaniclikeship003

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,145Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 76

Summary: The mahogany gave way to Abigail, standing there with careful eyes, and right as Eddie was about to open his mouth, Buck came up the sidewalk. He had a determined look on his face, eyes locked on Abigail, and he stepped around her to get into the house. Stepped around her to get closer to Eddie, and his fingers reached out, grabbed Eddie’s hair and tugged him down to his mouth.  Eddie was too confused for a moment to kiss back, instead, he noticed everything else. He noticed how Buck had put himself between Abigail and Eddie, he noticed how Abigail’s mouth had fallen open in an O. He noticed Buck’s grip in his hair, unyielding and strong, and lastly, he noticed the dirty moan his best friend let out against his lips. In the end, that was what got him moving again, shoving himself into Buck, fingers pulling at his waist to get him closer. Abigail was still standing there, looking at the ground, face flushed.

entry.title: A Noble Sacrifice
entry.summary:
Author: Chromedove

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,915Chapters: 12/15Kudos: 146

Summary: Eddie practically raised his sisters, always putting their needs above his own, even at great personal cost. Now, years later, and recovering from being shot, he’s still struggling to put himself first. When Sophia arrives for a surprise Christmas visit, she brings with her long-forgotten memories and reminders of the sacrifices Eddie has made—hoping to help her brother finally realize that he, too, deserves happiness.Apparently, this comes with realizing that maybe him and Buck have deeper connections than they originally thought...

entry.title: A drop of golden sun
entry.summary:
Author: NickName95

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,353Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 15

Summary: An AU 9-1-1 and Percy Jackson universe mashup cause I like both series. Truthfully they just weren’t the religious sort. That is until their son Daniel is diagnosed with juvenile leukemia.   It is then that the Buckley’s are more open to religion. More open to divine help. More open to anything that would help them keep their son alive. Apollo only meets with the Buckley’s a few times throughout Margaret’s pregnancy. He tells them that he can’t be too involved for godly reasons, and warns them that the child they now bear will be unlike their other two children. If any of the following caught your interest please click and read on.
